title: How to get my Whatsapp chat history - Quora

response.answer_text: Your WhatsApp chat histories are automatically saved daily/ weekly to your phone's memory. Depending on your settings, If you uninstall WhatsApp from your phone, but don't want to lose any of your messages, be sure to manually back up your chats before uninstalling. To backup your chats, go to your WhatsApp Settings > Chats > Chat backup > Back Up. To export a copy of the history of an individual chat or group, use the Email chat feature · Open the chat for the individual or group. · First of all open there individual whatsapp ID, Tap the Menu Button. · Tap on More. · Tap on Email chat. · Choose whether to Attach Media or not. An email will be composed with your chat history attached as a .txt document. · If you choose to attach media, the most recent media sent will be added as attachments. · When sending with media, you can send up to 10,000 latest messages. Without media, you can send 40,000 messages. These constraints are due to maximum email sizes. For more Whatsapp tricks and tips visit us …

Whatsapp do backup update of your chat in daily during night. So you can get your chat history till yesterday. For that you need to uninstall your whatsapp and install again and then you need to do log in with same account and whatsapp ask you for recover your chat history till yesterday.
